content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_ldw

GO
--Create a view for trip_data_green
DROP VIEW IF EXISTS gold.vw_trip_data_green
GO 
CREATE VIEW gold.vw_trip_data_green
AS
SELECT
    result.filepath(1) as year,
    result.filepath(2) as month,
    result.*
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'gold/trip_data_green/year=*/month=*/*.parquet',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_src1',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) with (
            Borough VARCHAR(15),
            trip_date DATE,
            trip_day VARCHAR(10),
            trip_day_weekend_ind CHAR(1),
            card_trip_count INT,
            cash_trip_count INT
    ) AS result

GO
SELECT * FROM gold.vw_trip_data_green;
